# Plugins

<!-- Code generated by typegen. DO NOT EDIT. -->
<!-- Regenerate with: make types -->

| Method | Endpoint | Handler |
|--------|----------|----------|
| GET | `/api/plugins` | HandlePlugins |
| POST | `/api/plugins/` | HandlePluginAction |
| GET, PUT | `/api/plugins/{name}/config` | HandlePluginConfig |

---

### `GET` /api/plugins

HandlePlugins serves plugin information endpoint
Returns list of installed plugins with their metadata and health status

**Handler**: `HandlePlugins`

---

### `POST` /api/plugins/

HandlePluginAction handles pause/resume actions for plugins
POST /api/plugins/{name}/pause - Pause a plugin
POST /api/plugins/{name}/resume - Resume a plugin

**Handler**: `HandlePluginAction`

---

### `GET | PUT` /api/plugins/{name}/config

HandlePluginConfig handles plugin configuration operations
GET /api/plugins/{name}/config - Get plugin configuration
PUT /api/plugins/{name}/config - Update plugin configuration

**Handler**: `HandlePluginConfig`

---
